segments.text: Observing this kitchen, the light from the window is inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's routine of drying dishes seems so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at that sinkâ€”it's a disaster in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows over, drenching everything below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot soaks in the mess, yet she polishes on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter holds more dishes, untouched by the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs boldly to raid the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool unstable, his reach strains toward the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong shift and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sister assists by waiting with outstretched arm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's all eyes on the jar, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside mocks the indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets will be warped from all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids' mischief could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
